description:
ClipClip is a free clipboard management software for Windows that will revolutionize the way you copy and paste.

ClipClip is a free clipboard management software for Windows that will revolutionize the way you copy and paste. 
ClipClip makes it possible to copy multiple texts, images or files to your clipboard. 
You can then browse or search through these Latest Clips, or convert them to Saved Clips so you can assign a title and organize them into folders to use later on.
